select.name: SelectOrderGoodsWithPriceStock
select.defineSQL:
select
(case tblGoods.isCatalog when 0 then (select sum(lastQty) as lastQty from tblStocks where tblStocks.GoodsCode=tblGoods.classCode and tblStocks.StockCode='@ValueofDB:StockCode' and tblStocks.StockCode='@ValueofDB:@TABLENAME_StockCode' and SCompanyID='@Sess:SCompanyID') else -99999999 end) f2, tblGoods.classCode f3, tblGoodsUnit.SecUnit f4, tblGoods.AccountingPrice f5, tblGoodsUnit.UnitD f6, tblGoodsUnit.SecUnitD f7, tblGoods.BarCode f8, tblGoods.GoodsNumber f9, tblGoods.GoodsFullName f10, tblGoods.GoodsSpec f11, tblGoods.Spec1 f12, tblGoods.Spec2 f13, tblGoods.Spec3 f14, tblGoods.GoodsFullNamePYM f15, tblGoods.Validity f16, tblGoods.BaseUnit f1, ViewVirtualStock.UseQty f17, ViewVirtualStock.orderQty f18 from tblGoods left join tblGoodsUnit with(index(IX_tblGoodsUnit_refdefault)) on tblGoodsUnit.f_ref=tblGoods.id and tblGoodsUnit.DefaultAssit=1 left join tblCustomerPriceDet on tblGoods.classcode = tblCustomerPriceDet.GoodsCode and tblCustomerPriceDet.f_ref=(select id from tblCustomerPrice where companyCode='@ValueofDB:CompanyCode') left join (select goodsCode,sum(lastQty+inQtyNotAudit+SInQtyNotAudit-outQtyNotAudit-BOutQtyNotAudit+buyOrderQty-salesOrderQty) as orderQty,sum(lastQty+inQtyNotAudit+SInQtyNotAudit-outQtyNotAudit-BOutQtyNotAudit) as UseQty from ViewVirtualStock where 2=2 and ViewVirtualStock.stockCode='@ValueofDB:StockCode' and ViewVirtualStock.stockCode='@ValueofDB:@TABLENAME_StockCode' GROUP BY goodsCode) as ViewVirtualStock on tblGoods.classCode=ViewVirtualStock.goodsCode left join tblCompany on (1=1 and tblCompany.classCode='@ValueofDB:CompanyCode')

field.name: (case tblGoods.isCatalog when 0 then (select sum(lastQty) as lastQty from tblStocks where tblStocks.GoodsCode=tblGoods.classCode and tblStocks.StockCode='@ValueofDB:StockCode' and tblStocks.StockCode='@ValueofDB:@TABLENAME_StockCode' and SCompanyID='@Sess:SCompanyID') else -99999999 end)

(case tblGoods.isCatalog when 0 then (select sum(lastQty) as lastQty from tblStocks where tblStocks.GoodsCode=tblGoods.classCode and tblStocks.StockCode='@ValueofDB:StockCode' and tblStocks.StockCode='@ValueofDB:@TABLENAME_StockCode' and SCompanyID='@Sess:SCompanyID') else -99999999 end)
